phrs.translation: 丁酰肼, 比久, 亚拉生长素, 二甲基琥珀酰肼

sentences.sentence: The concentration of daminozide, reaction time duration and pH were shown to have significant effects on the nitrate and nitrite contents and NDMA synthesis in the reaction system.
sentences.translation: 研究了植物生长调节剂比久对反应体系中硝酸盐、亚硝酸盐含量、亚硝胺合成的影响。
